solution_line_template: We know that Kevin found {kevin_eggs}, Bonnie found {bonnie_eggs} and George found {george_eggs} so {kevin_eggs}+{bonnie_eggs}+{george_eggs} = <<{kevin_eggs}+{bonnie_eggs}+{george_eggs}={other_children_total}>>{other_children_total}

Cheryl found {cheryl_eggs} eggs while the others found {other_children_total} eggs so {cheryl_eggs}-{other_children_total} = <<{cheryl_eggs}-{other_children_total}={difference}>>{difference} more eggs
